com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Interface CustomRhizosphereModel

All Superinterfaces:
RhizosphereModel
public interface CustomRhizosphereModel
extends RhizosphereModel

Allows POJOs used as Rhizosphere models to expose custom attributes not handled by the annotation-based mechanism provided by RhizosphereModelAttribute.

Rhizosphere internally uses custom tailored JavaScriptObjects to represent visualization models. POJOs can export their attributes to the visualization in 2 ways. Either automatically by annotating relevant fields with the RhizosphereModelAttribute annotation, or manually via this interface.

POJOs marked with this interface will pass the additional attributes defined in setCustomRhizosphereAttributes(JsoBuilder) to the generated JavaScriptObject model.

Attributes defined via this interface will exist in addition to other attributes automatically defined via annotations.

For example, the following class: 


 public class Person implements CustomRhizosphereModel {

   private String name;
   private String[] colorPreference;  // e.g. ["red", "pink", "green"]

   public Person(String name, String[] colorPreference) {
     this.name = name;
     assert colorPreference.length == 3;
     this.colorPreference = colorPreference;
   }

   @RhizosphereModelAttribute
   public String getName() {
     return name;
   }

   @Override
   public void setCustomRhizosphereAttributes(JsoBuilder builder) {
     builder.setString("bestColor", colorPreference[0];
     builder.setString("alternateColor", colorPreference[1]);
     builder.setString("worstColor", colorPreference[2]);
   }
 }

Defines a Rhizosphere model with 4 attributes: a name attribute, automatically derived via annotation and the three bestColor, alternateColor, worstColor manually exported via the CustomRhizosphereModel interface.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Summary
 void setCustomRhizosphereAttributes(JsoBuilder builder)
          Enrich the Rhizosphere model built from the POJO this interface is attached to with additional attributes.
 

Method Detail

setCustomRhizosphereAttributes

void setCustomRhizosphereAttributes(JsoBuilder builder)
Enrich the Rhizosphere model built from the POJO this interface is attached to with additional attributes.

Parameters:
builder - Helper class to set additional attributes on the Rhizosphere model extracted from the POJO.
